name: IBrewingRecipe
description: Interface for more flexible brewing recipes. Register using RegisterBrewingRecipesEvent and PotionBrewing.Builder.addRecipe(IBrewingRecipe) .

methods.name: isInput
methods.description: Returns true is the passed ItemStack is an input for this recipe. "Input" being the item that goes in one of the three bottom slots of the brewing stand (e.g: water bottle)

methods.name: isIngredient
methods.description: Returns true if the passed ItemStack is an ingredient for this recipe. "Ingredient" being the item that goes in the top slot of the brewing stand (e.g: nether wart)

methods.name: getOutput
methods.description: Returns the output when the passed input is brewed with the passed ingredient. Empty if invalid input or ingredient.
